JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Cleaners / renholdere,  Asker, Bærum, Drammen, Oslo, Norway / Norge
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
ARPI is a professional supplier of staffing solutions. Our areas of expertise mainly include building and construction, and also logistics and transportation.

We are part of the Norwegian owned ARPI Group, which consists of the following companies: ARPI AS, ARPI Industribemanning, ARPI Entreprenør og Landskap, ARPI Regnskap og Rådgivning and ARPI Aviation.

We are looking for cleaners for our customer.

Your main task will be to clean newly finished houses, there will be variations in both working hours and places.

You must have:

  • Experience from similar work
  • Driving license B

Permanent, fulltime job

Starting date: as soon as possible

Working hours: varied, can be late in the evening

Place of work: Oslo, Asker, Bærum, Drammen.

Salary:

from 196,04 NOK/hour to 209,99 NOK/hour, depending on experience

We will help you find a place to live near the job.

More information:

Mr. Øyvind Fossum, mobile phone: +47 4136 3894, oyvind@arpi.no

How to apply?

Send resume on mail to Mr. Øyvind Fossum at oyvind@arpi.no

Last date of application 01.06.2022

(from NAV EURES Norway)

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Vi søker etter renholdere. Jobben består i hovedsak av å rengjøre nybygde hus. Det blir derfor stor variasjon i arbeidstid og sted.

Arbeidsområde: Oslo, Asker, Bærum, Drammen

Du må ha:

  • Tidligere arbeidserfaring som renholder
  • Førerkort kl B

Fast fulltids jobb.

Arbeidstid: variert, kan bli sent på kvelden

Lønn:

fra 196,04 kr til 209,99 kr per time, varierer med erfaring.

Start:

snarest.

Flere informasjoner:

Øyvind Fossum, mobile phone: +47 4136 3894, oyvind@arpi.no

For å søke:

send CV pr e-post til oyvind@arpi.no

Søknadsfrist er 01.06.2022.

(fra NAV EURES Norge)
